config.script:
import time
		tagValue = system.tag.read('[default]site_composer2/Alarms/HMI_Alarm_Reset').value
	
		if tagValue == 0:
			newValue = 1
	    	system.tag.write('[default]site_composer2/Alarms/HMI_Alarm_Reset',newValue)
	    	time.sleep(1) 
	    	system.tag.write('[default]site_composer2/Alarms/HMI_Alarm_Reset',0)

messageHandlers.script: system.perspective.openPopup('IIiH2Lo6', 'Primary/Downtime_Composer2', showCloseIcon = False, draggable = False,resizable = False,  modal = True)
